subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ian Kinsler hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning to give the host Detroit an 8-6 victory, and Zack Greinke was 3 for 3 with a homer to help the Dodgers overcome his bad start and secure a win.
snippet: Ian Kinsler hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning to give the host Detroit an 8-6 victory, and Zack Greinke was 3 for 3 with a homer to help the Dodgers overcome his bad start and secure a win.
